About Me

Just your average med student turned hippie software developer. I have been coding for over a year now! Check out my work below.

Work

MyCows Ultimate

Built With: JavaScript, ES6, Node

A fun phone game to play with your friends on your next road trip! Get the best cow and beat your friends! Available on android and iOS.

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, Bootstrap

A website to keep track of your current tasks. Built in the style of a kanban board, you'll never miss another deadline!

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

A website for runners to find other to train with. Run Buddy also hooks you up with your own trainer.
